TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cihafayan, title = Cihafayan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cihafayan} }

S.FORM: == Cihafayan == Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Fungrincn ka alang Cihafayan. 101 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 221 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 83% niqan 183 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 17% niqan 38 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 77%, Truku 1%, Tayal 2%, Bunun 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%. Pusu nniqan alang Chihavaian, dungus na o "tnkuyan masu". Nniqan alang Nyusan Skanki Fungrin cng alang Sansingri. Gasuc Mniq hngari bi hraan hidaw Fungrin cng, gaga daya hari alang Sansingri hiya. Tiri lnglingay Sttu. Pgkla patas cyawtung Mgrig rulu: Taypey>kwotaw 1 haw>kwotaw 3 haw>Kwotaw 3 cya lutuc Taypey >elug wunsan>syeyn106>syeyn109>Peyyi kungru>Pinhay kungru>suhwa kungru>hwatung cungku dungru>elug cungsan>hwa39>hwa38-1>paru hakaw Mican>syeyn195>elug sansing>elug wunsan>Dhuq Klgan sjiqan nealang Amis. Djiyun kari Kari Amis ni Tlu. Snhiyun cungcyaw Pnrhulan Joro ni Teyeyncucyaw. Pnaah alang Tmhangan dha "Cawbi " uri ka alang Cihafayan, seejiq Amis o tmhangan "Chihavaian" ksun, dungus na o "tnkuyan masu". Pgkla patas saan rmigaw Pgkla patas saan rmigaw klwaan kmlawa sapah Fungrin cng. Pnyahan pnatas

== Cihafayan == Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Fongrincn ka alang Cihafayan. 101 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 221 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 83% niqan 183 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 17% niqan 38 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 77%, Troko 1%, Tayal 2%, Bonon 1%, ni rahoq na o 1%. Poso nniqan alang Chihavaian, dongos na o "tnkoyan maso". Nniqan alang Nyosan Skanki Fongrin cng alang Sansingri. Gasoc Mniq hngari bi hraan hidaw Fongrin cng, gaga daya hari alang Sansingri hiya. Tiri lnglingay Stto. Pgkla patas cyawtong Mgrig rolo: Taypey>kwotaw 1 haw>kwotaw 3 haw>Kwotaw 3 cya lotoc Taypey >elog wonsan>syeyn106>syeyn109>Peyyi kongro>Pinhay kongro>sohwa kongro>hwatong congko dongro>elog congsan>hwa39>hwa38-1>paro hakaw Mican>syeyn195>elog sansing>elog wonsan>Dhoq Klgan sjiqan nealang Amis. Djiyon kari Kari Amis ni Tlo. Snhiyon congcyaw Pnrholan Joro ni Teyeyncocyaw. Pnaah alang Tmhangan dha "Cawbi " ori ka alang Cihafayan, seejiq Amis o tmhangan "Chihavaian" kson, dongos na o "tnkoyan maso". Pgkla patas saan rmigaw Pgkla patas saan rmigaw klwaan kmlawa sapah Fongrin cng. Pnyahan pnatas
